mapper.select: select * from ( select pe.e_no, pe.p_no, pe.o_no, pe.e_amount, pe.e_size, o.user_no, o.o_name, o.o_address, o.o_hp, o.o_request, o.totalprice, o.o_date, o.o_status, o.o_payment from product_e pe right join orders o on pe.o_no = o.o_no ) a left join product p on p.p_no = a.p_no where a.o_date = #{ o_date }
